summary: Now that the full first season is out, I’ve gotten myself to watch Cloak & Dagger (I only watched the first ep when it first...
body:
Now that the full first season is out, I’ve gotten myself to watch Cloak & Dagger (I only watched the first ep when it first came out). I’m halfway through, and I have two things to say:

  • It’s not for everyone. It’s slow, atmospheric, with lot of dream sequences. Not a lot happens in individual episodes, and even that’s hard to follow sometimes because of the non-linear narrative. Most of the important stuff happens through dialogue.
  • It would be interesting even without the comicbook stuff. I mean, ty and Tandy wrangling their survivor’s guilt and different stations in life alone makes it a very interesting character drama.

title: Bucky Barnes x reader
body:
Asking you out

  • Okay so we know this dude had a hard time getting who he was
  • But even during the Civil War event he didn’t look that scared to speak his mind (in my opinion, look how he talked to Sam, how he fought…)
  • So I don’t see him as the quiet mysterious type
  • Anyway
  • He has friended you quite easily since you didn’t try to kill him or anything
  • You talked about what he remembered from the past, how much of a punk Steve is
  • You telling him it’s not going to get better
  • You’ll tell him about memes
  • “Is it… mee-mees ?”
  • Anyway, so, he know he can trust you since you’re both on the same side and always fighting next to each other
  • The fact that Steve trust you is also a big bonus
  • Even if times has changed and himself too, he still like to flirt
  • You’re both pretty close and like to tease each other
  • At first he just think it’s just some crush he has on you but he notice how persistent it is
  • He’ll keep an eye on you, to see if you feel the same thing
  • As he see you acting a little differently from when you are with the others he decide to make the first step
  • He’ll be more straight forward, flirty
  • And then he’ll ask you out for a dinner, he won’t call it a date at first
  • If you quickly understand what is going on by flirting back, then he’ll call it a date
  • He’ll try to keep things as comfortable and enjoyable as possible
  • He didn’t lost his good manners and know how to be a gentleman
  • He’ll try to show you how he really feel by being a little more touchy than usual
  • Holding hands, small hugs
  • A really smooth date let me tell you
  • It probably won’t be where there’s a lot of people, since it can be dangerous, so it’ll be a discreet place
  • Where you can laugh or dance without people minding it too much
  • It’s not a cliché date, but it’s still quite romantic, you had a lot of fun
  • Completely hyped  to do that again and again

blog.name: blessedharlot
blog.title: blessedharlot
blog.description: Queer, poly, trans anarchist seeking mystic awe and wonder, and aching for something that isn't the violence of capitalism. I've got fragments of Christianity and Zen Buddhism in me; also willing to find inspiration anywhere I can. Hardcore MCU fan but I dont find much fandom space that engages the text the way I want to, so I mostly keep out of the way. I also love rasslin.

summary:
Theres a lots of ppl in the Marvel fandoms for a lot of different reasons. 
If youre curious enough to be following me, I will...
body:
Theres a lots of ppl in the Marvel fandoms for a lot of different reasons.

If youre curious enough to be following me, I will tell you that I have been a devotee of the medium of film since I was a kid, and I started my Marvel rship with the movies. Theres a lot of hands and a lot of voices in the MCU, but overall they meet my specific standards for thematic depth and good characterization, and my standards for usually doing abt as well as I expect Hwood to do on issues of systemic justice. Even though Ive come to have serious concerns w how Tony is being handled currently, I was there opening weekend for the first Iron Man and I value that exciting experience of being there from the beginning of the adventure. Its an important film series to me.

MCU!Steve is the Steve I fell in love with, specifically w his CATWS arc. Hes the first MCU character I bonded with, and I am a fan of the Russos’ ways of storytelling in particular. MCU!Bucky and eventually MCU!Nat (in AOU) also caught my heart.

CATWS is also the film that made me finally think, “well this is badass, and directly based on comics; clearly I need to be reading comics.” I was uncharacteristically late to seeing CATWS, it was in 2015 that I finally watched it. So I picked up the hobby of reading comics at age 41, and Ive been reading for 3 years. Ive focused on Steve’s books, and I adore him, and Bucky, and Nat in the comics as well. In the comics, my love list also includes Ian Rogers, Jack Monroe and others.

Im grateful to have a whole new medium of art to explore at this point in my life and I love the chance that the digital world affords me to actually just dive into the Marvel archives and read so much. I deeply love Brubaker’s Cap run, and Remender’s Cap run, and Edmundson and Liu’s Widow runs, and Kot’s Bucky run, and many others.

And I absolutely love the way two very, very different forms of media can tell parallel stories with parallel themes about parallel characters that are the same but different, that build and explore those characters and bring them to life in ways that diverge and converse with and enhance each other.

And also, just to be clear, film is a medium that sits deep in my bones. The MCU as an experiment that worked - and Cap and Avenger movies in particular - is my “home base” in the whole Marvel canon, with Brubakers run in the comics a close second home.

blog.name: thereal-svetlana
blog.title: The Real-Svetlana
blog.description: Retired Model ,Mother of 4 , owner of Clozet Freak inc ./ Mental Health Advocate www.clozetfreakcosmetics.com

summary: I’ve always dreamt of playing a villain in a movie .. everyone always wants to be the hero for me I want to be the villain .....
caption:
I’ve always dreamt of playing a villain in a movie .. everyone always wants to be the hero for me I want to be the villain .. it’s a way for me to express myself and release my inner Mental demons I face everyday as a person who lives with Mental Illness. I want to channel all of my anxieties, my feelings , my fears into something . A character that I can create and show it as art . Does Mental Illness always have to be ugly ? This is my continued conversation I have with myself . I will continue to work hard and make a difference anywhere I can . I will create beautiful art and images through my Mental Illness … I will use make up , fashion and photography as I always have as my outlet . .
Putting my dreams into the universe!
@therealstanlee @marvelstudios
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
#photography #xmen #stanlee #marvel #dccomics #universalstudios #disney #modelbehavior #internationalmodel #villan #mentalhealth #voguemagazine #ellendegeneres #oprah #omagazine #richardbranson

blog.name: timeofheroesrpg
blog.title: Time of Heroes
blog.description:
Héroes. Durante décadas, los humanos contaron con la protección y la seguridad que sus héroes les proporcionaban en todo momento. Al principio tan solo fueron un par de individuos, ocultos tras una máscara y un alias con el que protegerse de las amenazas a las que se enfrentaban. Luego vinieron más, todo tipo de héroes dispuestos incluso a sacrificarse por el bien mayor. Algunos nacieron en nuestro planeta, otros llegaron de muy lejos, pero a todos ellos los unía un mismo objetivo: proteger a la humanidad ante cualquier clase de peligro. Desde su aparición en la sociedad, sus hazañas ocuparon el foco central de los telediarios y sus trajes se convirtieron en los disfraces favoritos de los más pequeños (y no tan pequeños). Sus rostros eran una cara amiga en el momento más desesperado. Sus nombres, la promesa de una nueva esperanza.

Pero algo ha cambiado.

tags: rpg DC Marvel Valiant DarkHorse Vertigo

tags: I love hope and scott so much
body:
Ant-Man and the Wasp !!

No spoilers don’t worry ;)

IT FINALLY CAME OUT IN THE UK AND IVE FINALLY SEEN IT !!!!!!!!

Wow I loved it so so much it was really funny but also had some great character/relationship moments. There was action and drama but also humour and fun.

I highly enjoyed this film it might even be one of my favourites. I absolutely adore Hope like what a gal she is incredible - CAN I BE HER. Scott continues to be amazing as do the rest of the characters :)

I’m not gonna spoil the mid-credits scene but holy shittttttt I’m deceased. What the fuck Marvel aRe YoU tRyInG tO KiLl mE ? I haven’t recovered from Infinity War yet and then you throw that at me ? Not cool.

Overall though I freaking loved the movie I just can’t believe we have to wait so long for the next Marvel film :(

P.S.

It feels so wonderful being able to scroll through tumblr and twitter without the fear of being spoiled anymore. I’ve been in spoiler-avoiding mode for the last month man.

summary: Last night I had a dream that Thor (MCU Thor) was reading Lord of The Rings and having so much fun with it. He was really...
body:
Last night I had a dream that Thor (MCU Thor) was reading Lord of The Rings and having so much fun with it. He was really curious as to why nobody else thought Sam and Frodo were gay, and he started shouting about Groot as soon as the ents showed up.

But, like, what if Thor started reading more midgardian books? What if he made a really badly designed blog where he reviewed books? What happens when Thor reads Harry Potter for the first time? What about when Loki convinces him to read Stephen King and he can’t sleep without Mjolnir?

summary: My friend, a normal person who doesn't stan Marvel like I do, getting ready to watch Infinity War with me: are you going to...
body:
My friend, a normal person who doesn't stan Marvel like I do, getting ready to watch Infinity War with me: are you going to cry?
Me, Mega Marvel Stan, already sobbing uncontrollably while clutching a blanket with Loki's beautiful face on it: no

summary: SO since i have no self control i made another thing (it’s on ao3) and its post-infinity war and i made myself cry while writing...
body:
SO since i have no self control i made another thing (it’s on ao3) and its post-infinity war and i made myself cry while writing it

There are moments that the words dont reach.

Pain. All Tony knew was pain.

There is suffering to terrible to name.

Children who have lost their parents are called orphans. But what about parents who have lost their children?

You hold your child as tight as you can.

He was gone. Ash in the wind. Dust in the air. His hands were covered in it. His ashes.

And push away the unimaginable.

Tony brought him into this. If only he hadn’t made the Iron Spider. If only he hadn’t given him the suit, only to take it away. If only he hadn’t even met him.

But he was the best thing that ever happened to Tony.

The moments when you’re in so deep.

Tony would give everything just to see him smile again. To see his eyes shine one more time while blabbering on about science. To hear his bright laughter as they work in the lab together. To run his fingers through his messy curls as Mamma Mia played distantly in the background.

Tony would give up everything for him.

It feels easier to just swim down.

Tony is nothing without him.

And now he’s gone.

You push away what you could never understand.

Tony shut down. He couldn’t feel. He couldn’t think. Everytime he closed his eyes, he saw his broken, dull eyes, devoid of their sparkle. Everytime he looked at his hands, he saw the dust on them and why, why him, why him, why him why him why why why–

And Tony realized it was his fault.

You push away the unimaginable.

His fault. His fault. The light from his eyes are gone because of Tony. He never went back to Earth because of Tony. He could never tinker in the labs or laugh with his friends or have his first kiss or get married and grow old because of Tony.

He killed him.

Tony killed Peter.

So why should he deserve to live?
body_abstract: SO since i have no self control i made another thing (it’s on ao3) and its post-infinity war and i made myself cry while writing it
